```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# setwd("/home/agricolamz/work/scripts/praat/extract_sound_and_picture")
library(tidyverse)
files <- list.files("./picture/")
files <- str_replace_all(files, ".png$", "")
data_frame(files) %>%
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(sound_files = unlist(str_split(files, "_"))[1],
         tier = unlist(str_split(files, "_"))[2],
         label = unlist(str_split(files, "_"))[3],
         audio = paste0('<audio controls> <source src="sound/',
                        files, '.wav" type="audio/wav"></audio>'),
         pictures = paste0('<img src="picture/', files, '.png" style="width:10%" onclick="myFunction(this);">')) %>% 
  select(-files) %>% 
  DT::datatable(filter = 'top', rownames = FALSE, options = list(pageLength = 50, dom = 'tip'), escape = FALSE)
```

<script>
function myFunction(imgs) {
  var expandImg = document.getElementById("expandedImg");
  var imgText = document.getElementById("imgtext");
  expandImg.src = imgs.src;
  imgText.innerHTML = imgs.alt;
  expandImg.parentElement.style.display = "block";
}
